title: The Arctic Polar Bear
description: Polar bears are large carnivores found in the Arctic. They are well-adapted to life in a cold climate with thick fur and a layer of blubber for insulation.

questions.question: What is the primary food source for a polar bear?
How does a polar bear's skin color help it survive?
options: Its black skin absorbs sunlight and helps it stay warm
Its white skin helps it camouflage in the snow
Its skin changes color with the seasons
It helps them attract a mate
questions.correct_answer: Its black skin absorbs sunlight and helps it stay warm

questions.question: What is a polar bear's scientific name?
Which of these is a unique adaptation of a polar bear?
options: They can go for months without food
They have partially webbed feet for swimming
questions.correct_answer: They have partially webbed feet for swimming
